PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07582019-06-09TBS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Government Contracts Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) reduce the risk of corruption and collusion in the bidding process for goods and services contracts; (2) reduce the risk of confusion and misinterpretation of the Regulations; and (3) modernize the content of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0199 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Government Contracts Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) reduce the risk of corruption and collusion in the bidding process for goods and services contracts; (2) reduce the risk of confusion and misinterpretation of the Regulations; and (3) modernize the content of the Regulations.
